description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. It has been suggested that this game, which is comparable to (trademark removed) with additional paddles on the top and bottom of the screen and additional modes be renamed, so I removed the second half of the reference to the classic table tennis game from the title.  Purchase the game to unlock multiplayer, high scores, hard mode, and longer playtimes.
